songs.title: How Ya Doin? (Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: All]
Hey, how ya doin'?
Sorry you can't get through
Why don't you leave your name and your number
And we'll get back to you, oooh
Hey, how ya doin'?
Sorry, you can't get through
Why don't you leave your name and your number
And we'll get back to you

[Verse 1: Leigh-Anne Pinnock & Jade Thirlwall]
Ain't got no time for what you think can be described as love
How could you hold on me, you're missing me, I've had enough
It's been so long since you have treated me like I deserved
So long (Long), baby, I'm gone (Gone)
You can leave a message for me after the tone (Ohh)

[Pre-Chorus: Jesy Nelson]
You called, I missed it
You called, I missed it
You called, and I missed it
Never get back, getting tired of listenin'

[Chorus: All]
Hey, how ya doin'? (Doin'?)
Sorry, you can't get through
Why don't you leave your name and your number
And we'll get back to you
Hey, how ya doin'? (Doin'?)
Sorry, we don't mean to be rude
Why don't you leave your name and your number
And we'll get back to you

[Pot-Chorus: All]
I know that you keep calling my phone
But baby there ain't nobody home
So won't you leave your name and your number
And we'll get back to you

[Verse 2: Perrie Edwards with Jade Thirlwall & Jade Thirlwall]
I'm through with wishing things with you and me, could be so good
Time to wake up, boy, no makeups can make me a fool
Too much history, now it comes down to one thing
So long (Long), baby, I'm gone (Gone)
You can leave a message for me after the tone (Oh)

[Pre-Chorus: Jesy Nelson & Jade Thirlwall]
You called, I missed it
You called, I missed it
You called, and I missed it
Never get back, getting tired of listenin', hey

[Chorus: All & Jade Thirlwall]
Hey, how ya doin'? (Doin'?)
Sorry, you can't get through (Oh, whoa)
Why don't you leave your name and your number (Your number)
And we'll get back to you (We'll get back to you)
Hey, how ya doin'?
Sorry, we don't mean to be rude (Oh, yeah)
Why don't you leave your name and your number (Number)
And we'll get back to you

[Post-Chorus: All]
I know that you keep calling my phone
But baby there ain't nobody home
So won't you leave your name and your number
And we'll get back to you, hey

[Verse 3: Missy Elliott]
Now listen, boy, you can never play miss got my mind twisted
Whenever I don’t answer you be leaving messages
You don’t do me right cause you got way too many chicks
You get the wrong number, brrr, it’s unlisted
I’m change my digits, I’m keep the distance
Oh, now you want me back, you want to pay a visit?
You get the dial tone, click-click (Wahhh)
Brand new song here, yeah, Missy with Little Mix
Yeah, I used to hold you down, I don’t want you around
Cause I won’t play that, you just sold me the clown
Boy, it’s over now, yeah it’s over now
And when you call, I’m send you to my voicemail

[Chorus: All, Jade Thirlwall]
Hey (Hey), how ya doin'? (Doin'?)
Sorry, you can't get through
Why don't you leave your name and your number (Your number)
And we'll get back to you (Hey, yeah)
Hey, how ya doin'?
Sorry, we don't mean to be rude (Sorry, we don't mean to be rude)
Why don't you leave your name and your number (Number)
And we'll get back to you (We'll get back to you)

[Outro: Jesy Nelson & Jade Thirlwall]
Never get back, never gonna get back
Never get back, never gonna get back (Aaaah)
Never get back, never gonna get back
Never get back, never gonna get back (Yeah)
Never get back, never gonna get back
Never get back, never gonna get back
Never get back, (Mmmmh) never gonna get back
Never get back to you
The number you have dialed, has been changed
